questions.text: Who stole a car battery in the opening of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Norm asked Carla if her car needed a new battery. She said, "No, I got one right here. Norm, close the hood would you?"

questions.text: How long had Kelly been gone?
questions.explanation:
1 year.

	Kelly was sent to Europe by her father in hopes that Kelly would forget about Woody. It didn't work however.

berets.

	At first she gave him a plain beret. She said it was a choice between that and the one with the arrow through it. Woody said, "Oh, this one's nice too." Kelly pulled another one out of the bag and said, "Surprise, I got them both!"

questions.text: Who came back with Kelly from Europe?
questions.explanation:
Henri.

	Henri was played by Anthony Cistaro. Cistaro has also guest starred on "The Nanny" and "Friends".

questions.text: What did Kelly's friend tell Woody he was going to do?
options: let the air out of his tires
questions.explanation:
steal his girlfriend.

	Henri was contently making jokes about how he was going to steal Woody's girlfriend. Woody found them annoying, but Kelly thought they were cute.

questions.text: Who did Carla say the French's comic hero was?
questions.explanation:
Jerry Lewis.

	Carla was telling Woody to be aware of Henri because the French weren't known for their sense of humor. Jerry Lewis was long time comic partner of Dean Martin. He was also well known as host of the annual MDA (Muscular Dystrophy Association) fundraiser.

questions.text: What fear did Woody have about Kelly?
questions.correct: that she went to bed with her friend
options: that she was suffering from depression
that she would break up with him
that she had a husband already
questions.explanation:
that she went to bed with her friend.

	He didn't trust Henri at all. He wanted to trust Kelly, but because she kept standing up for Henri, Woody was having some trouble trusting her now as well.

questions.text: Why didn't Woody have sex with Kelly?
options: She refused until they dated at least two years.
She refused because she was already sleeping with Henri.
questions.explanation:
He was waiting for marriage.

	Sam asked Woody how his love life (the physical part) with Kelly was. Woody said, "I can't speak for Kelly, but I'm looking forward to it." Sam, who has slept with thousands of women, was surprised and Woody explained they were waiting till marriage.

questions.text: Who planned to have his head cryogenically frozen?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff believed he could have his head cryogenically frozen and then when a new body was found he could be brought back to life. Frasier stood up for Cliff.

questions.text: What did the tape recorder inside the box say?
questions.explanation:
Help me.

	Cliff and Frasier played a trick on the others in the bar, telling them there was a frozen head in the box. The others didn't believe them, but still opened the box to see. When the box was open it kept saying, "Help me." It scared the others and Cliff and Frasier laughed at them being afraid of a tape recorder.
